text: 16.18: Dan 12.1; VB 4.5; 8.5; 11.13; 11.19Ana maaŋ nzuaim, mba buip vhekvhegap, fhura shɨkshɨga ndogi, khɨkhɨɨ bakɨvi him, buip phɨrerim, khɨmkhɨk bakɨme kha nuianan mbui. Mba khɨmkhɨk, ana guigira kɨvgi. Fhe Bakɨme fhara guarara kha nuiana muuŋgi tugen kegap zav ntige khar ki tugen ki, gumgi gu mbigi, mbe maaŋ muuŋgi khɨmkhɨga the garim, ana muuŋgi fhuvara.
